name: Planetary Invasion
description:
A game about traveling between 3 different planets, and killing the enemies on each one. Each planet has unique music that fits the planets vibe. The goal is to destroy the enemy bases and all the enemies on each planet.

Press right mouse button to use the grappling hook, and left to shoot.

The floating trees and bushes are 100% intended :)

Models created by Aloctl, music by ultraLuD, coding by Xcrypt
Made in 48 hours for the GMTK gamejam 2021.
